entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell FlyoutItems disappear when left ALT key is pressed (Windows). #25046
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton if initially hidden and shown even if ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25038
  • NavigateCommand Not Working #25037
  • ImageButton wrong size and missing border on Android #25034
  • The test NavigatingAndNavigatedFiresForShellModal fails #25027
  • iOS Release pipelines taking an hour #25022
  • [BUG] Duplicated items in searched results #25020

Closed

  • Memory Leaking and buggy Editor #23838
  • HybridWebView not showing on iOS 18 #25031
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITesting] Move ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to appium #24916
    Backlog
  • CollectionView scroll in .NET MAUI Overlaps UI when there are more data. #15983
    Backlog
  • MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync need parameter for rear or front camera #25032
  • Entry Text Alignment is different when Editing #25026
  • MAUI iOS Publish to AppStore: Rejected because of BrowserEngineKit in use #24980
  • [iOS, macOS] Text in the Editor control disappeared when reducing the Scale of the Editor control #24583
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Dropping a pic to copy works on Android but not on Win #6886
    Backlog
  • IconFont not working #8426
    Backlog
  • Error missing assembly when add bundle ID #25021
  • Platform specific Razor pages compiled for all platforms #25019
  • Remove excessive API docs in comments #24731
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25047
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix collectionview tests rc2 #25045
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25044
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25043
  • Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25042
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #25041
  • Remove Drag and Drop Tests from Catalyst #25039
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    community ✨
  • [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25035
  • [net9.0] Merge release rc2 to net9.0 #25028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25025
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #25024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Merged

  • Update the Benchmarks.Droid app to use built in Android GetExternalFilesDir #25015
    community ✨, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly

Updated

  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    community ✨
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, 9.0-rc2
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    community ✨
  • Fix and verify shadow / shape / clip #24941
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Fix NRE in Shell SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker #24970
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
